https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8ZC1499OVD1vThGYvvmyupKmyXB.jpg Solutions to one problem can bring their own problems. In the middle of the night, a solitary sleeper awakes in bed. He's uncomfortable, his bed is too short for his body; in fact, his legs stick straight up at the end of the bed. To deal with this and ensuing challenges to his comfort, he takes extreme measures with his extremities. Comfy
